description: Returns a viewport that encloses the given bounds with padding.
name: getViewportForBounds

tags.param: bounds - Bounds to fit inside viewport.

params.description: Minimum zoom level of the resulting viewport.
params.name: minZoom

tags.param: minZoom - Minimum zoom level of the resulting viewport.

params.description: Maximum zoom level of the resulting viewport.
params.name: maxZoom

tags.param: maxZoom - Maximum zoom level of the resulting viewport.

bounds - Bounds to fit inside viewport.
width - Width of the viewport.
height - Height of the viewport.
minZoom - Minimum zoom level of the resulting viewport.
maxZoom - Maximum zoom level of the resulting viewport.
padding - Padding around the bounds.
tags.remarks: You can determine bounds of nodes with {@link getNodesBounds } and {@link getBoundsOfRects}
tags.returns: A transformed Viewport that encloses the given bounds which you can pass to e.g. setViewport .
